## TinySynq.deviceId property

Automatically generated ID for device's DB instance.

**Signature:**

```typescript
get deviceId(): string | undefined;
```

## Remarks

This ID is used by the sync protocol to identify the database. One it is generated once during setup and does not change. The value is stored in the `_meta` table (`meta_name='device_id'`<!-- -->). \_\_Do not edit this value; doing so would corrupt synchronisation\_\_.
